usage.cn: 爱情是一个精心设计的谎言
usage.eng: Love is a carefully designed lie.

usage.cn: 创造一款伟大的产品或者服务的最直接、最简单的方法就是去做你自己想用的。这会让你设计出你所了解的产品，并能立即明白你做的东西是否靠谱。 ——《rework》 英文原文
usage.eng: The easiest, most straightforward way to create a great product or service is to make something you want to use. That lets you design what you know--and you'll figure out immediately whether or not what you're making is any good.
